delegate.description: Delegate a task to a specialized agent. Routes the task to the appropriate specialized agent (flight_agent, hotel_agent, visa_agent, tripadvisor_agent) based on the user's query. The specified agent will execute the task and return results.

inputs.agent: string – required – The target agent name. Must be one of: 'flight_agent', 'hotel_agent', 'visa_agent', 'tripadvisor_agent'
inputs.task: string – required – The task to perform. Examples: 'agent_get_flights', 'agent_get_flights_flexible' (for flight_agent), 'get_hotel_rates', 'get_hotel_rates_by_price', 'get_hotel_details' (for hotel_agent), 'get_traveldoc_requirement' (for visa_agent), or any TripAdvisor tool name (for tripadvisor_agent)
inputs.args: object – required – Dictionary containing arguments to pass to the agent task. The structure depends on the specific task being delegated

outputs.agent: string – the agent that was delegated to
outputs.task: string – the task that was delegated
outputs.args: object – the arguments that were passed to the task
